ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Get Zoom Rooms Details
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Get Zoom Rooms Details
ActivityMetadata.Description:
The Zoom Rooms dashboard metrics lets you know the type of configuration a Zoom room has and details on the meetings held in that room.
Use this API to retrieve information on a specific room. **Scopes:** `dashboard_zr:read:admin` **Prerequisites:** * Business, Education or API Plan with Zoom Rooms set up.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Get Zoom Rooms Details

The Zoom Rooms dashboard metrics lets you know the type of configuration a Zoom room has and details on the meetings held in that room. Use this API to retrieve information on a specific room. **Scopes:** `dashboard_zr:read:admin` **Prerequisites:** * Business, Education or API Plan with Zoom Rooms set up.

Method: Get

OperationID: dashboardZoomRoom

EndPoint:

/metrics/zoomrooms/{zoomroomId}
